dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: ...so, uh, what exactly is closed? Like, is it just, I don't know, a side street or something?

dialogue_turns.text: No, Host_A, we're talking about, um, traffic restrictions on actual republican highways.

dialogue_turns.text: Since when though? Has this, like, just happened today?
